title: Falc達o
body: The first steamship to establish regular voyages between various ports on the south coast of Madeira. It arrived at the port of Funchal on February 27, 1881, being a 40-ton boat with a power of 22 horses, ordered by the firm Blandy Brothers & Co.

1881: Arrival of the steamship Falc達o at the port of Funchal
